snippet.description: Mittelschmerz (German: "middle pain") is a medical term for "ovulation pain" or "midcycle pain". About 20% of women experience mittelschmerz, some every ...

snippet.title: Mittelschmerz: MedlinePlus Medical Encyclopedia
snippet.description: Causes. About 1 in 5 women have pain around the time of ovulation. This is called mittelschmerz. The pain may occur just before, during, or after ovulation.

snippet.description: Jan 7, 2011 - If you experience cramping pains in your lower abdomen around the midpoint of your menstrual cycle, you may be having "Mittelschmerz".
